ygData.subject: Re: The endless OOCs
ygData.msgSnippet: Guys, you can still argue,but honestly, what is keeping you from doing it privately over your own emails. No one else cares about this bickering, and I am even

Subject: Re: The endless OOCs

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Guys, you can still argue,but honestly, what is keeping you from doing
it privately over your own emails. No one else cares about this
bickering, and I am even more sick of continuesly hearing " I wont do it
ever again, but your a dork" or "I know I should do this privatly, and
you can kneecap me, but I want to argue" come on how many times do other
RPG'ers have to tell you to keep it private.
